TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.Control implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class ContentControl Inherits Control Implements IAddChild
public ref class ContentControl : System::Windows::Controls::Control, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 表示包含一段任意类型内容的控件。

span.span: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含任何类型的公共语言运行时对象 (如字符串或对象) 或对象 (如或)。The can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a object) or a object (such as a or a ). 这使你可以将丰富的内容添加到控件比如和。This enables you to add rich content to controls such as and . 下图显示四个按钮，其属性设置为以下项之一：The following illustration shows four buttons whose property is set to one of the following: - 一个字符串。A string. - 对象。A object. - 对象。A object. - A包含其他控件对象。A control that contains other objects. ![四个按钮](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四个按钮")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") 与不同类型的内容的四个按钮Four buttons with different types of content A具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 如果你想要提高控件的外观，你可以创建一个新。If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 另一个典型方案是使用以显示有关中选定的项的详细信息控件。Another typical scenario is to use the to show more information about an item selected in an control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将绑定到集合和显示基于所选内容的信息](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建显示在备注部分中的四个按钮。The following example demonstrates how to create the four buttons shown in the Remarks section. > [!NOTE] > 尽管[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]示例版本可以使用``内容的每个按钮周围的标记，则没有必要。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何使样式，使控件具有增强的可视外观。The following example shows how to make a style for a so that the control has an enhanced visual appearance. [!code-xaml[ContentControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ContentControl#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性属于类型，没有任何限制上你可以将置于。Because the property is of type , there are no restrictions on what you can put in a . 显示，后者位于的。The is displayed by a , which is in the of the . 每个键入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]具有其默认情况下。Every type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] has a in its default . 有关详细信息，如何显示，请参阅。For more information about how the displays , see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果你设置或属性、忽略属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例指定的格式对象通过设置中的属性并将其应用到两个对象，它们继承自。The following example specifies the format of objects by setting the property in a and applying the to two objects, which inherit from . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#ContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#contentcontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为用于指定的外观。Set this property to a to specify the appearance of the . 数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个模板选择器，以使应用程序编写器能够提供自定义模板选择逻辑。

span.span: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
A data template selector.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，你创建时有多个为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己逻辑来选择将基于每个数据对象的属性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，如果有不同的对象类型，你可以设置属性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果你做，则无需创建。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果你有相同类型的但具有不同的属性的对象，还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自，并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后，你可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果这两个和设置属性，则将忽略此属性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为属性不具有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果你也正在开发的设计器通常调用此方法或开发你自己的控件包含。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
